Subject: Re: Draft letter to Congress on Epstein 
Date: Mon, 12 Aug 2019 20:11:57 +0000 
I just tried you. 
On 
Aug 12, 2019, at 3:55 PM, 
Begin forwarded message: 
E.(OIG) < 
> wrote: 
From: ' (ODAG)" 
Date: Au ust 12, 2019 at 2:07:27 PM EDT 
To: " 
E.(OIG)" < 
>, (DO) (FBI)" 
Subject: Draft letter to Congress on Epstein 
This is the letter that we intend to send to the congressional leaders. Please review and let me know if you have 
concerns about any of the specific statements. This attempts to take into consideration your comments from last 
night. Apologies for the tight turnaround, but if you can review and revert with any issues in the next hour, that would 
be appreciated. 
• 
Principal Associate Deputy Attorney General 
<Epstein Impdf> 
EFTA00027096
